title: S4 Ep30: Does economics do enough race-related research?
itunes:title: Does economics do enough race-related research?
description: Imran Rasul tells Tim Phillips about new research that shows the fraction of published economics research devoted to the causes and consequences of racial inequality is much smaller than in political science or sociology - and that this inequality has been getting worse.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
